column1: Magnetic resonance image (MRI) size (128, 256, 1) capturing the head of a man aged  of 37 years old, with a sequence weighted in T2 and sagittal section. The specific slice is number 174, counted from the right hemisphere of the skull. We see clearly: the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2631.4453 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 6375.5859 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 1.3184 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1015.1367 mm³.

MRI image size (128, 256, 1) of a human head of a man of 37 years old in weighting T2, with sagittal section. We observe slice n°174 starting from the right hemisphere of the skull. The following elements are present in the image: the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2631.4453 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 6375.5859 mm³, the white matter of right hemisphere of cerebellum of volume 1.3184 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 1015.1367 mm³.
